triplets: Tool used for removing chalk or marker from blackboards, whiteboards, and similar surfaces
Erasing chalk from blackboards or dry-erase markers from whiteboards during teaching, presentations, or writing corrections
Wood or plastic base, felt or foam erasing surface, sometimes rubber components for durability
Felt or foam pad that contacts the board to remove markings
Handle made of wood or plastic for gripping
Varies depending on manufacturer; common colors include black, red, blue, or wooden finish
Classroom or office tools, writing and teaching equipment
Various manufacturers producing educational and office supplies
Approximately 0.1–0.3 kg depending on size and materials
Typically 1–5 years depending on frequency of use and material quality
